name: Tree Slam
text:
If you are adjacent to a tree token, target a unit in range, otherwise, target a minion adjacent to you.
After the attack: If the target was adjacent to you, move it 1 space to a space adjacent to you, if able.

name: Makeshift Weapon
text:
**Choose one â€”**
- Target a hero adjacent to you.
- Remove a ::token_tree:: Tree token adjacent to you. Target a hero in range.

name: Mystic Saplings
text: Place up to 3 ::token_tree:: tree tokens in radius, not adjacent to a tree token. Heroes may move through a space with a tree token. Do not remove the tree tokens at the end of round.

name: March of Nature
text: Adjacent Tree tokens in a battle zone count as melee minions immune to ranged attacks.

name: Gifts of Nature
text: If you are adjacent to a tree, you may retrieve a discarded card.

name: Nature's Protector
text: Target a unit in range, adjacent to a tree token.

name: Toss Away
text: Move up to 1 space. Push an adjacent token up to 3 spaces. If the token is pushed 2 or more spaces, an enemy hero adjacent to that token discards a card, if able.

name: Tree of Plenty
text: Either you, or a hero in radius, may retrieve a discarded card if either of you are adjacent to a tree.

name: Nature's Guardian
text: Target a unit in range, adjacent to a tree token.

name: Mighty Throw
text: Move up to 1 space. Push an adjacent token or a minion up to 4 spaces. If it is pushed 2 or more spaces, an enemy hero adjacent to that token or a minion discards a card, if able.

name: Claim Dominance
text: **This round:** Up to 1 adjacent non-immune enemy minion does not count towards the minion total during minion battle.

name: Trample
text:
If you move in a straight line: You may ignore units; if you moved through an enemy hero, that hero discards a card, or is defeated;
defeat up to 1 minion you moved through.

name: Into the Canopy
text:
Swap places with a tree token in radius.
You may then place a minion adjacent to that tree token into a space adjacent to you.

name: Abundance
text: Both you and a friendly hero in radius may retrieve a discarded card if either of you are adjacent to a tree.

name: Nature's Champion
text:
Target a unit in range, adjacent to a tree token.
May repeat once, targeting a different hero.

name: Monstrous Throw
text: Move up to 1 space. Push an adjacent unit or a token up to 5 spaces. If it is pushed 2 or more spaces, an enemy hero adjacent to that unit or token discards a card, if able.

name: Assert Dominance
text: **This round:** Up to 2 adjacent enemy minion do not count towards the minion total during minion battle, regardless of immunity.

name: Angry Stampede
text:
If you move in a straight line: You may ignore units; if you moved through an enemy hero, that hero discards a card, or is defeated;
defeat up to 2 minion you moved through.

name: Treetop Ride
text:
Swap places with a tree token in radius.
You may then place a minion adjacent to that tree token into a space adjacent to you.
